name: WorkflowBridge
signal_source: Remote work feedback: 'I spend 30 minutes a day just moving information between apps that should talk to each other'
description: Intelligent workflow automation that connects disparate productivity apps with context-aware data bridging
target_user: Remote professionals using multiple productivity tools who lose time on manual data transfer and context switching
pain_point_evidence: Remote workers reporting significant productivity losses from app fragmentation and manual data synchronization
differentiation: Focus on connecting existing tools rather than replacing them
subscription_fit: Tiered pricing based on number of app integrations and automation complexity

pricing.trial_strategy: Free tier with 3 app connections, premium unlocks unlimited integrations
